oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Claim of Saul McAlexander against State of Tennessee for supplies furnished to the "Rebel Army"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: State reparation claim of Saul McAlexander for "quartermaster stores." These state (as opposed to US) claims for Civil War damages are fairly rare and were instituted by Gov. Brownlow's Reconstruction government to compensate loyalists for wartime losses incurred at the hands of Confederate forces. Original in the Hardeman County Archives. The materials have been microfilmed and are available for research at the Tennessee State Library and Archives (Hardeman County Loose Records Project, Roll A-19,438).
